query:
SELECT 
                    transfer.id as "id!",
                    initiator_id,
                    from_account_id,
                    to_account_id,
                    transaction_id,
                    amount as "amount: _",
                    note,
                    "transaction".timestamp as "transaction_timestamp"
                FROM transfer
                JOIN "transaction" ON (transfer.transaction_id = "transaction".id)
                WHERE from_account_id = ? OR to_account_id = ?
